channel.title: CVE Feed for Fuji Xerox Co.,Ltd. -- ApeosWare Management Suite and ApeosWare Management Suite 2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fuji Xerox Co.,Ltd. -- ApeosWare Management Suite and ApeosWare Management Suite 2

item.title: CVE-2019-6004|2024-08-04T20:09:24.034Z -- fuji%20xerox%20co.%2Cltd. -- apeosware%20management%20suite%20and%20apeosware%20management%20suite%202
item.description: Open redirect vulnerability in ApeosWare Management Suite Ver.1.4.0.18 and earlier, and ApeosWare Management Suite 2 Ver.2.1.2.4 and earlier allow remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites and conduct phishing attacks via unspecified vectors.
